faqs.question: How can I apply a coupon on my Okal order?
faqs.answer: You can apply a coupon code on the checkout page before making payment. Tap on 'Apply Coupon', choose or enter your code, and your discount will be applied automatically if the offer is valid.

faqs.question: Why is my coupon code not working?
faqs.answer: Please check the coupon terms — some are valid only for specific products, minimum cart values, or payment methods. Also ensure it hasn’t expired or been used already.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple coupons in one order?
faqs.answer: Currently, only one coupon can be applied per order on Okal. You can still combine a coupon with cashback or wallet balance.

faqs.question: Where can I find available coupons and offers?
faqs.answer: You can view active offers in the 'Offers & Coupons' section on the home screen or during checkout. Personalized offers may also appear in notifications.

faqs.question: What happens if I cancel or return an order with a coupon?
faqs.answer: If an order using a coupon is canceled or returned, the coupon may become reusable only if the terms allow. Instant discounts are reversed, and cashback may be recredited to your Okal wallet.

faqs.question: Does Okal offer cashback or referral rewards?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal runs referral and cashback programs occasionally. You can check the 'Refer & Earn' section in the app for current promotions.

faqs.question: Can I apply offers on all payment methods?
faqs.answer: Some offers are restricted to certain payment methods like UPI, credit cards, or wallets. Always review the coupon details before applying.

faqs.question: Do coupons apply on all products?
faqs.answer: Some coupons are valid only on select brands or categories. Exclusions are listed in the offer terms, like dairy or baby products.

faqs.question: Can I use coupons on already discounted products?
faqs.answer: Most coupons cannot be combined with existing discounts unless mentioned in the offer details.

faqs.question: Why did my cashback not reflect after payment?
faqs.answer: Some cashback offers take up to 72 hours to reflect in your Okal wallet or payment source. Please refer to the offer’s terms.

faqs.question: Can I transfer cashback from Okal wallet to my bank account or another account?
faqs.answer: Okal wallet cashback is currently non-transferable and can be used only for future purchases.

faqs.question: Why was my coupon removed at checkout?
faqs.answer: Coupons can be auto-removed if the cart conditions (minimum value or eligible items) change during checkout.

faqs.question: Does Okal have student or first-order offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal occasionally offers discounts for new users. Keep an eye on banners or notifications for active promotions.

faqs.question: Can I share my coupon with someone else?
faqs.answer: Some coupons are account-specific and non-transferable. Using them from another account may invalidate the coupon.

faqs.question: Do I get loyalty points for repeat orders?
faqs.answer: Okal is building a loyalty rewards program where users can earn points for frequent orders. Stay tuned for updates.

faqs.question: Do offers apply automatically during checkout?
faqs.answer: Some promotional discounts are automatically applied when you meet eligibility conditions, even without a coupon code.

faqs.question: Can I use coupons on express delivery items?
faqs.answer: Some coupons may not apply to express delivery items. Check the coupon details for eligibility.

faqs.question: Are there special offers for festivals or holidays?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal runs special offers during festivals and holidays. Check the 'Offers' section during these periods.

faqs.question: Where can I find partner bank or wallet offers?
faqs.answer: Partner bank or wallet offers are displayed in the 'Offers & Coupons' section or during payment selection if eligible.

faqs.question: How can I know the expiry date of a coupon?
faqs.answer: Coupon expiry dates are mentioned in the coupon details. Expired coupons cannot be applied.

faqs.question: Does Okal send notifications for new offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal sends push notifications and in-app alerts when new offers or coupons are available.
